text.title: Private park - Living with charm and uniqueness
text.description:
First occupancy after renovation ‚Äì 4.5-room apartment with charm in Kochergut

Located on the sought-after Weissensteinstrasse, nestled in the historic park of Kochergut, awaits a very special 4.5-room apartment with a unique floor plan. The apartment has been completely renovated and offers modern living comfort in a quiet and yet central location.

Highlights of the apartment:

  • First occupancy after high-quality overall renovation

  • On the ground floor with a spacious terrace into the green

  • Unique floor plan with well-thought-out room layout

  • Historic charm combined with modern materials

  • Flooded with light rooms with stylish details

  • Access to the well-maintained park of Kochergut

Location: The apartment is located quietly and idyllically, without having to forego the proximity to the city. Public transport, shopping and leisure facilities are within a few minutes' reach. The green surroundings and the impressive architecture of Kochergut give this property a very special quality of living.

Garage boxes can be rented additionally.

A home with history ‚Äì and future.

text.title: Exclusive 2.5-room apartment on Kramgasse in Bern
text.description:
Grandeur in the Bern Old Town

Exclusive 2.5-room apartment on the 2nd floor at Kramgasse 52 in the heart of Bern's Old Town (UNESCO World Heritage), approx. 91 m2 of stylishly renovated living space with new elevator access.

The late Baroque apartment from the early 18th century was tastefully restored with the help of heritage conservation, taking into account the historical substance, and meets today's high comfort standards.

Through antique oak doors, you enter the representative salon with a fireplace, mirror, and tile stove. The original Bernese parquet has been professionally renovated, and the period-typical wall paneling in discreet color gradations elegantly frames the large new Baroque windows.

Between the courtyard-side sleeping area with storage space in the original wall cabinet is the newly created bathroom with a separate toilet, shower, and contemporary sink. The beautifully preserved tile stove exudes a lot of charm.

Separated from the two spacious rooms by the light courtyard, the fully equipped kitchen is located on the opposite side of the corridor.

For additional comfort in your own quiet home, the private washing machine with dryer provides convenience.

Perfect location: The apartment impresses with its unbeatable, sunny location in the historic Old Town. The Zytglogge is only a 2-minute walk away, as are the bus and tram stops. The good connection to public transport makes this location particularly attractive. Bern's main station is reachable in 8 minutes. All amenities for daily needs and health are located in the immediate vicinity.

attachments.alt: Large room with wooden parquet floor, fireplace, white walls, large windows with doors to the outside

ENG

Now available! Starting now, we offer centrally located apartments in Bern, Belpstrasse 23, ranging from 24 to 40 square meters. Starting at 385 CHF/week, you can choose from various Pop types: S Compact, S, M, L, L Deluxe, XL, Duplex and 2.5. .

How to book your apartment:

Just download our app:

  • For iOS: Search City Pop in the App Store

  • For Android: Search City Pop in the Google Play Store

Once installed:

  • Create an account

  • Go to the search section

  • Select "Search and Book Now!"

  • Choose Bern as your city

  • Set your desired check-in and check-out dates

What‚Äôs included in your stay?

Each apartment is fully equipped, including:

  • Kitchen, living room, bedroom, bathroom

  • Full kitchen inventory (plates, glasses, pots, etc.)

  • Towels and bed linen

  • Utilities included

  • Wi-Fi and Smart TV

Minimum stay: 4 weeks

Maximum stay: 52 weeks. After one year, guests are welcome to book a new apartment.

Additional services available via the app:

  • Cleaning service (weekly or biweekly)

  • Parking

  • Storage Room

The building will also feature fantastic communal spaces:

  • Co-living area

  • Co-Working

  • Cinema

  • Fitness

Each guest can personalize their service package to best fit their lifestyle.

As easy as booking a hotel room! Reservations are now open ‚Äì what are you waiting for?

attachments.alt: Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, wooden countertop, built-in Siemens microwave oven, various kitchen appliances and utensils, open shelving with decorative items
Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, wooden shelves, built-in appliances, and a dining area with a table and chairs

The image shows a modern and stylish open-plan living and dining area. The space features a gray sofa, a dining table with place settings, and a kitchen area with a dishwasher visible. The walls are painted in light colors, and the room has a mix of woode

Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, built-in appliances including a dishwasher, open shelving, and a marble-like countertop. The kitchen has a clean, minimalist design with a mix of wood and gray tones.
Modern bathroom with marble-like tile walls, glass shower enclosure, vanity with white sink and wooden cabinets, towels, and a potted plant
Spacious bedroom with a built-in wooden wardrobe, a large bed with gray bedding, and a decorative lamp on the side table. The room has a minimalist and modern design with a cozy atmosphere.

Cozy living room with a gray sofa, decorative pillows, and a throw blanket. There is a wooden shelf unit with decor items, and a small side table with a plant. The room has large windows that provide natural light.
Modern kitchen with dark cabinets, wooden accents, built-in dishwasher, and open view to the living area
Modern and open kitchen space with wooden tables and benches, black pendant lights, and a large wall text that says 'In this kitchen we share cultures'.
Dark, theater-style room with gray upholstered seating, wood flooring, and a projector screen or display at the front
Dark room with a large projection screen, comfortable gray sofas and chairs, and recessed lighting providing a cozy and immersive home cinema experience.
Spacious living room with large sectional sofa, hanging chair, bookshelves, and decorative wall mural. The room has track lighting, skylights, and a fireplace.
5-story office building with a modern facade, located on a street with trees and other residential buildings. The building has the CityCoop logo displayed on the ground floor.
